chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
k: nat
i: nat
v: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
divides (ps i) (encode_state (k, v)) -> i = k

Premises:
encode_state = fun (n : nat) (c : nat * vec nat n) => ps (fst c) * exp 0 (snd c) : forall n : nat, nat * vec nat n -> nat Arguments encode_state {n}%nat_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
ps = {| str := fun n : nat => nthprime (2 * n); str_inj := fun (n m : nat) (H : nthprime (2 * n) = nthprime (2 * m)) => let H0 : 2 * n = 2 * m := nthprime_inj (2 * n) (2 * m) H in (fun lemma : n = m <-> BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation (n = m) (BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m) lemma) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat BinNums.Z eq BinInt.Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff x y)) n (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) eq_refl m (BinInt.Z.of_nat m) eq_refl) (let H1 : BinInt.Z.mul (BinNums.Zpos (BinNums.xO BinNum
divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments divides (_ _)%nat_scope
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_rec : forall (A : Type)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
primestream_divides : forall (ps : primestream) (n m : nat), divides (ps n) (ps m) -> n = m
qs_exp_div : forall (i j n : nat) (v : vec nat n), i < j -> ~ divides (qs i) (exp j v)
ps_exp : forall (n m : nat) (v : vec nat m) (i : nat), ~ divides (ps n) (exp i v)
vec_prod_div : forall (m : nat) (v : vec nat m) (u0 : nat) (p : pos m) (i : nat), v#>p = S u0 -> qs (p + i) * exp i (v[u0/p]) = exp i v
exp_cons : forall (n i x : nat) (v : vec nat n), exp i (x ## v) = qs i ^ x * exp (S i) v
qs_ps_div : forall n m : nat, ~ divides (qs n) (ps m)
ps_qs_div : forall n m : nat, ~ divides (ps n) (qs m)
vec_prod_mult : forall (m : nat) (v : vec nat m) (u : pos m) (i : nat), exp i (v[(1 + (v#>u))/u]) = qs (u + i) * exp i v
exp = fix exp (n i : nat) (v : vec nat n) {struct v} : nat := match v with | vec_nil => 1 | Vector.cons _ x n0 v0 => qs i ^ x * exp n0 (S i) v0 end : forall n : nat, nat -> vec nat n -> nat Arguments exp {n}%nat_scope _%nat_scope
in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (k, v)
in_mma_sss_dec_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])
in_sss_step : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (st1 st2 : nat * data), fst st1 = k + length l -> one_step i st1 st2 -> sss_step one_step (k, l ++ i :: r) st1 st2
prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1 /\ (forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1 \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), m // m0 -1> m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), m // m0 -1> m1 -> P m m0 m1
prime_divides : forall p q : nat, prime p -> prime q -> divides p q -> p = q
divides_1_inv : forall p : nat, divides p 1 -> p = 1
divides_mult_inv : forall p x y : nat, prime p -> divides p (x * y) -> divides p x \/ divides p y
mm_sss_DEC1_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k u i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]
sss_compute_fun : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), out_code (fst st2) P -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st3 -> st2 = st3
divides_pow : forall p n k : nat, prime p -> divides p (n ^ k) -> divides p n
out_code = fun (X : Type) (i : nat) (P : code X) => i < code_start P \/ code_end P <= i : forall X : Type, nat -> code X -> Prop Arguments out_code {X}%type_scope _%nat_scope _ /
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
divides_mult : forall p q k : nat, divides p q -> divides p (k * q)
divides_mult_r : forall p q k : nat, divides p q -> divides p (q * k)
not_prime_1 = fun H : prime 1 => match H with | conj H0 x => match H0 eq_refl return ((forall q : nat, divides q 1 -> q = 1 \/ q = 1) -> False) with end x end : ~ prime 1
mm_sss_DEC0_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = k /\ w = v
sss_compute_step_out_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st2 -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, q < k /\ sss_steps one_step P q st2 st3
in_code = fun (X : Type) (i : nat) (P : code X) => code_start P <= i < code_end P : forall X : Type, nat -> code X -> Prop Arguments in_code {X}%type_scope _%nat_scope _ /
subcode_in_code : forall (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X) (i : nat), P <sc Q -> in_code i P -> in_code i Q
in_out_code : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (P : code X), in_code i P -> out_code i P -> False
mm_sss_INC_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), INCₐ x // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[(S (v#>x))/x]
in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)
subcode_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a r : list X), j = i -> (i, a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
sss_loop_complete : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data), (forall x : data, x <> f x) -> forall C1 C2 : data -> Prop, (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, out_code p P -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) ->...-> p = q /\ (exists n : nat, C2 (iter f x n) /\ spec (iter f x n) y)
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s

```coq
intros. unfold divides, encode_state, ps in H. inversion H. reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros. unfold divides, encode_state, ps in H. inversion H. reflexivity.
